metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6489 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The RSA and DSA decryption code in Nettle makes it easier for attackers to discover private keys via a cache side channel attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6489` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhogweed4 - 3.2-1ubuntu0.16.04.1
libnettle6 - 3.2-1ubuntu0.16.04.1
nettle-bin - 3.2-1ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> original patch had issues, see http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q3/206 subsequent commits fix issue

criterions.comment: nettle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2-1ubuntu0.16.04.1').
